name: HUD Strategem
description:
An Experiment with Match 3 games. The tetris-style game is shrunken down to a mere HUD in-game. The enemies spawn in the game map that reflects on the HUD, manipulate the enemies to play the match 3.

Controls (character-based):

WASD-- Move

Space--- Hard-Drop Piece

LMB-- Movement attack

RMB-- Rotation attack

Controls (Match 3 only):

Arrow Keys-- Move pieces

Space--- Hard-Drop Piece

E / Q-- Rotate Piece
